ast.name: Chess
ast.comment:
In this release:
• bug fixes in validating moves
• a by-pass method to disable validation temporarily (thank you "white FOX" for the suggestion and thank you "I am jay wye" for your slider code)
• checkmate detection
• info sprites aligned

In the next release:
• stalemate detection
• en passant

body.text: Loads initial position as in new game to start with. Aim is to allow the user to load a saved game in future. So, the TRUE below represents the initial position.
Initialises the game variables, sets the board and starts the game...
Tap event to select and move the chess pieces
Moves a chess piece from one square to another, if it's a valid move.
Returns column row (CR) pair for a given XY coordinate.
Returns the index where the given CR pair resides in a string collection (piecesLoc).
Returns the piece name from the idx-th element of the string collection (piecesLoc).
A wrapper function to invoke respective validate functions based on the current chess piece selected.
Returns TRUE if the current move is valid one for pawns. Otherwise, returns FALSE.
Returns TRUE if the current tap is a valid selection of a chess piece. Otherwise, returns FALSE.
Returns column value from a CR pair.
Returns the colour name (Black or White) from the piece name.
Returns row value from a CR pair.
Temp function for developers to check the chess piece locations in the string collection (piecesLoc). Mainly for debugging...
Temp function for developers to check the state of chess piece sprites. Mainly for debugging...
Main function to set all chess pieces. Invokes SetPiece in a loop.
Sets a blank chess board.
Draw the cell borders...
Draw the cells...
Sets the correct chess piece for a given XY coordinate.
Returns TRUE if the current move is valid one for rooks. Otherwise, returns FALSE.
Returns TRUE if the current move is valid one for knights. Otherwise, returns FALSE.
Returns TRUE if the current move is valid one for bishops. Otherwise, returns FALSE.
Returns TRUE if the current move is valid one for queens. Otherwise, returns FALSE.
Queen will follow the rules of rook or bishop or king!!!
Returns TRUE if the current move is valid one for kings. Otherwise, returns FALSE.

thenBody.text: Not a normal move, see if it is a castling move...

body.text: Returns the index of sprite located at the given column row pair.
Shows the pieces to promote.
Tap event to promote pawn to higher ranks
Hides the pieces shown to promote.
Displays the background tiles for the promotional pieces.
Hides the promotional pieces background tiles.
Returns the piece name for a given piece value.
Checks if the game is finished or not and displays corresponding message.
Returns chess notation for a given CR value
Returns CR value from chess notation
Returns column label in chess notation
Returns row label in chess notation
Saves the current move in an index that is used to undo moves
Displays controls keys. At present, undo is the only key programmed.
Tap event to undo moves
Returns the piece value for a given piece name.
Undo moves
Returns TRUE if the given colour king is in check by the opponent
Returns the index of the first occurrence of the piece
Returns CR from the idx-th element of the string collection (piecesLoc).
Returns a copy of the PL string collection
Makes a mock move using a temp string collection

decls.name: checkBlack
decls.comment: True if black is in check

decls.name: checkWhite
decls.comment: True if white is in check

body.text: i is column
i1 is row
